overview_of_class: Part of the EDI curriculum, this course builds upon DSGN 401-1, particularly within the realm of interaction design. Students are challenged to explore novel and multimodal approaches to interaction design and are introduced to the broader concept of experience design. Teaching methods include lectures, labs, reading, homework assignments, and projects.
name: Human-Centered Design Studio 2
